property-details.property-description:
Property Overview

This charming retreat in Knoxville offers a cozy and comfortable stay. The property features modern amenities and is perfect for both short and long stays.

 

The space includes a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious living area, and dedicated workspaces. The bedroom is designed for relaxation with a comfortable bed and ample storage.

Location

Located in a quiet neighborhood in Knoxville, this property is close to local attractions, restaurants, and shopping centers. Enjoy easy access to downtown Knoxville and the University of Tennessee.
